shows.title: Silent Disco
shows.desc:
We’ve got the transmitters and headphones. Now we can go late and loud – and no one will even notice! So, pick your channels and get into the groove. It's Andy H V's Heather Wall & Joel Baker

Andy H is resident DJ at Sheffield’s legendary Tuesday Club. Having honed his skills in the world of turntablism, Andy champions the art of real DJing and channels that energy into every performance. A UK DMC and Red Bull 3Style finalist , he applies his unique style to dancefloor bass-music while still remaining true to his hip hop roots

Joel B and Heather Wall join forces for the first time ever at the Greenbelt Silent Disco - having always played against each other previously. This is the duo's debut - expect nothing but magic.
